Name: CT023 - Report a change of address pdf
Output_template:
{"name":"{reference}","remove_margins":"","setPaperType":"a4","content":"
Form name {form_name}
Reference {reference}
Date {today_en}

Which best describes your situation?

@af:if({movingOutOfPortsm} = '' and {movingToPortsmouth} = '' and {landlordAgent} = '' and {purchase} = '')
Moving Within Portsmouth {movingWithin}
@endaf:if
@af:if({movingWithin} = '' and {movingToPortsmouth} = '' and {landlordAgent} = '' and {purchase} = '')
Moving out of Portsmouth {movingOutOfPortsm}
@endaf:if
@af:if({movingWithin} = '' and {movingOutOfPortsm} = '' and {landlordAgent} = '' and {purchase} = '')
Moving to Portsmouth from somewhere else {movingToPortsmouth}
@endaf:if
@af:if({movingWithin} = '' and {movingOutOfPortsm} = '' and {movingToPortsmouth} = '' and {purchase} = '')
Landlord / Agent {landlordAgent}
@endaf:if
@af:if({movingWithin} = '' and {movingOutOfPortsm} = '' and {movingToPortsmouth} = '' and {landlordAgent} = '')
Purchase property {purchase}
@endaf:if
@af:if({occupierOther} = 'Occupier')

Your Details
